front.title: RADIUS Attributes for Filtering and Redirection

abstract.t: This document defines the NAS-Traffic-Rule and Acct-NAS-Traffic- Rule attributes within Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) that is based on and extends on the filtering capability defined by Diameter's NAS-Filter-Rule Attribute Value Pair (AVP) described in RFC 4005, and the IPFilterRule syntax defined in RFC 3588.
